tool_description:
Singapore Pools 4D and TOTO (with Special Draw) Premium Live Result
(For Malaysia, Singapore and Indonesia market)
name: SG 4D Live Result (VIP)
title: SG 4D Live Result (VIP)

api_list.name: Past Results
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sg-4d-live-result-vip.p.rapidapi.com/history/2023/01/31"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sg-4d-live-result-vip.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
